author: jed
msg: Add shortcut class in providers.py for Linode

author: jed
msg: Account for the case where the HTTP API does not Keep-Alive.
If we get BadStatusLine back from httplib, try to connect again and do the
request recursively.  We only attempt this once, however.
This was necessary for Linode to operate, as before calling an API method more
than once resulted in BadStatusLine (due to the closed connection).
